entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:05PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Thunderstorms This Evening... Strong thunderstorms are occurring along the Dalton Highway and will continue until about midnight tonight. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 9:35AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water Along The Tanana River Into Next Week... High water continues along glacially fed rivers draining the Alaska Range, including the Delta, Nenana and Tanana Rivers.
